title: Phoenix Descends – Queen with a Thousand Pets - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Merchants   Modern Knowledge   Pirates   Polyandry   Revenge   Reverse Harem   Transmigration
author: Tiangouyueyan   天狗月炎
description: The Maritime Queen has arrived. Losers get out of the way! Father and brother ruined, mother dead in vain, family fortune stolen. Crossing over from another world, Ling Qingyu swore to the heavens: you will return all that you have taken from me! She relies on her talent, knowledge and tremendous courage to build a merchant empire step by step. By coincidence, she attracts many talented, handsome men to her flag: traveling abroad requires a loyal and cold-blooded killer, a gentle general who sweeps through thousands, a peerless and free-spirited scholar…>
